scripts.build: yarn clean && build-resources && tsc && if [ -d 'node_modules/teams-mobile-sdk/node_modules/react' ]; then rm -R node_modules/teams-mobile-sdk/node_modules/react; fi
scripts.start-android: adb -s emulator-5556 reverse tcp:3333 tcp:3333 && adb -s emulator-5556 reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && adb -s emulator-5556  shell am start -n "com.microsoft.skype.teams.alpha/com.microsoft.skype.teams.Launcher" -a android.intent.action.MAIN -c android.intent.category.LAUNCHER --esn "sdkRunner"
scripts.start-ios-sim: xcrun simctl launch booted com.microsoft.dmx.teamspace SDK_RUNNER $(ifconfig en0 | awk '/inet.[0-9]/{print $2}') 3333
scripts.start-ios-device: idevicedebug run com.microsoft.dmx.teamspace SDK_RUNNER "$(ifconfig en0 | awk '/inet.[0-9]/{print $2}')" 3333
